title: 671 43 "Defeat Sugar! The Army of the Little People Charges!"Transliteration: "Datō Shugā - Kobito no Heitai Totsugeki!" (Japanese:打倒シュガー 小人の兵隊突撃！) Masahiro Hosoda Shōji Yonemura November 23, 2014(2014-11-23) June 16, 2024
transformers_text: 671 43 Defeat Sugar The Army of the Little People Charges Transliteration Dat S hug K obi to no He itai To tsu geki Japanese Masahiro Ho soda Sh ji Yone mura November 23 2014 2014 11 23 June 16 2024 Zoro's battle with Pica continues as Luffy and Viola move forward Meanwhile the tower elevator makes it to the palace first floor as Lao G continues to attack Thunder Soldier After Robin lures Tre bol out of the Officer Tower Leo runs in and throws the Tata ba basco in Sugar's bowl only for her to see through its trick and toss it away The dwarves charge in attempt to attack her but she transforms them into toys Sugar then calls Tre bol and warns him of the attack so Tre bol catches a ship with his powers and tosses it to break open the tower
tf_idf_text: defeat sugar army little people charge transliteration dat hug obi itai tsu geki japanese masahiro soda yone mura november june zoros battle pica continue luffy viola move forward meanwhile tower elevator make palace first floor lao continue attack thunder soldier robin lure tre bol officer tower leo run throw tata basco sugar bowl see trick toss away dwarf charge attempt attack transforms toy sugar call tre bol warn attack tre bol catch ship power toss break open tower
